mapper.sql: op_id, use_id, username, frist_menu, second_menu, third_menu, detail_info, create_time
mapper.insert: insert into t_opweb_record (op_id, use_id, username, frist_menu, second_menu, third_menu, detail_info, create_time) values (#{opId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{useId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{username,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fristMenu,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{secondMenu,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{thirdMenu,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{detailInfo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into t_opweb_record
op_id,
use_id,
username,
frist_menu,
second_menu,
third_menu,
detail_info,
create_time,

mapper.update:
update t_opweb_record
use_id = #{useId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
username = #{username,jdbcType=CHAR},
frist_menu = #{fristMenu,jdbcType=CHAR},
second_menu = #{secondMenu,jdbcType=CHAR},
third_menu = #{thirdMenu,jdbcType=CHAR},
detail_info = #{detailInfo,jdbcType=CHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where op_id = #{opId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_opweb_record set use_id = #{useId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, username = #{username,jdbcType=CHAR}, frist_menu = #{fristMenu,jdbcType=CHAR}, second_menu = #{secondMenu,jdbcType=CHAR}, third_menu = #{thirdMenu,jdbcType=CHAR}, detail_info = #{detailInfo,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where op_id = #{opId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from t_opweb_record
and `username` like #{user_name} '%' and create_time >= #{start_time} and #{end_time}>=create_time
order by op_id desc
